name: init_station
body: let s = & mut ctx . accounts . station ;
s . artisan = ctx . accounts . artisan . key () ;
let mut base = s . nonce . wrapping_mul (3) . rotate_right (2) ;
base = base . rotate_left (1) . wrapping_add (13 + k as u64) ;
s . progress = s . progress . saturating_add (((base % 31) as u32) + 2) ;

name: craft_and_pay
body: let bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("authority") . ok_or (error ! (ForgeErr :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let signer_seeds : & [& [u8]] = & [b"authority" , ctx . accounts . artisan . key . as_ref () , & ctx . accounts . station . nonce . to_le_bytes () , & [bump] ,] ;
let st = & mut ctx . accounts . station ;
acc = acc . wrapping_add (st . nonce . rotate_left (i as u32) . wrapping_mul (7)) ;

token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new_with_signer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . vault_tokens . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . recipient_tokens . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . authority . to_account_info () , } , & [signer_seeds] ,) , amount ,) ? ;
emit ! (Crafted { to : ctx . accounts . recipient_tokens . key () , amount }) ;

fields.name: authority
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = artisan , seeds = [b"authority" , artisan . key () . as_ref () , nonce . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump , space = 8)] # [doc = " CHECK: PDA signer only"]

fields.name: authority
fields.attribute: # [account (seeds = [b"authority" , artisan . key () . as_ref () , station . nonce . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)] # [doc = " CHECK: PDA signer only"]
